quotes.message: Wishing to be friends is quick work, but friendship is a slow ripening fruit.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: Hold a true friend with both your hands.
quotes.name: Nigerian Proverb

quotes.message: A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out.
quotes.name: Walter Winchell

quotes.message: The wise man learns more from his enemies than the fool does from his friends.
quotes.name: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.message: Misfortune tests the sincerity of friends.
quotes.name: Aesop

quotes.message: The most beautiful discovery true friends make is that they can grow separately without growing apart.
quotes.name: Elisabeth Foley

quotes.message: Sometimes being a friend means mastering the art of timing. There is a time for silence. A time to let go and allow people to hurl themselves into their own destiny. And a time to prepare to pick up the pieces when it's all over.
quotes.name: Octvaia Butler

quotes.message: Who is mighty? He who makes an enemy into a friend.
quotes.name: Hebrew

quotes.message: One of the most beautiful qualities of true friendship is to understand and to be understood.
quotes.name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.message: Keep your friendships in repair.
quotes.name: Samuel Butler

quotes.message: Friendship is always a sweet responsibility, never an opportunity.
quotes.name: Khalil Gibran

quotes.message: We're born alone, we live alone, we die alone. Only through our love and friendship can we create the illusion for the moment that we're not alone.
quotes.name: Orson Welles

quotes.message: Friendship is the only cement that will ever hold the world together.
quotes.name: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.message: Each friend represents a world in us, a world possibly not born until they arrive, and it is only by this meeting that a new world is born.
quotes.name: Anais Nin

quotes.message: Friendship marks a life even more deeply than love.
quotes.name: Elie Wiesel

quotes.message: Most of us don't need a psychiatric therapist as much as a friend to be silly with.
quotes.name: Robert Brault

quotes.message: The language of friendship is not words but meanings.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: To have a few amazing friends on this side of eternity, this sometimes grotesque amusement park, is the greatest joy.
quotes.name: Ann Lamott

quotes.message: A loyal friend laughs at your jokes when they're not so good, and sympathizes with your problems when they're not so bad.
quotes.name: Arnold Glasgow

quotes.message: I would rather walk with a friend in the dark, than alone in the light.
quotes.name: Helen Keller

quotes.message: Friends are God's way of taking care of us.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: A true friend is the best Possession.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Friendship increases by visiting friends but visiting seldom.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Friendship is one mind in two bodies.
quotes.name: Mencius

quotes.message: Keep your friends close, your enemies even closer.
quotes.name: Sun Tzu

quotes.message: Make a friend when you don't need one.
quotes.name: Jamaican

quotes.message: No better relation than a prudent and faithful friend.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: One enemy is too many and a hundred friends too few.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: Little friends may prove great friends.
quotes.name: Aesop

quotes.message: Strangers are just friends waiting to happen.
quotes.name: Rod McKuen

quotes.message: The best mirror is an old friend.
quotes.name: George Herbert

quotes.message: The road to a friend's house is never long.
quotes.name: Danish Proverb

quotes.message: The wolf and the dog agree, at the expense of the goat which together they eat.
quotes.name: Basque

quotes.message: When I eat your bread, I sing your song.
quotes.name: German

quotes.message: You never really know your friends from your enemies until the ice breaks.
quotes.name: Eskimo

quotes.message: There is nothing on this earth more to be prized than true friendship.
quotes.name: Thomas Aquinas

quotes.message: A friend is someone who gives you total freedom to be yourself.
quotes.name: Jim Morrison

quotes.message: Friends show their love in times of trouble, not in happiness.
quotes.name: Euripedes

quotes.message: Friendship is born at that moment when one man says to another: What! You too? I thought that no one but myself . . .
quotes.name: CS Lewis

quotes.message: Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend.
quotes.name: Albert Camus

quotes.message: A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you.
quotes.name: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.message: Life is an awful, ugly place to not have a best friend.
quotes.name: Sarah Dessen

quotes.message: It's the friends you can call up at 4 a.m. that matter.
quotes.name: Marlene Dietrich

quotes.message: Friendship isn't a big thing it's a million little things.
quotes.name: Unknown Author

quotes.message: In everyone's life, at some time, our inner fire goes out. It is then burst into flame by an encounter with another human being. We should all be thankful for those people who rekindle the inner spirit.
quotes.name: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.message: Friendship is like money, easier made than kept.
quotes.name: Samuel Butler

quotes.message: There are some people in life that make you laugh a little louder, smile a little bigger, and live just a little bit better.
quotes.name: Unknown Author

quotes.message: Good friends help you find important things when you have lost them. Your smile, you hope, and your courage.
quotes.name: Unknown Author

quotes.message: True friendship comes when the silence between two people is comfortable.
quotes.name: David Tyson Gentry

quotes.message: Friendship consists in forgetting what one gives and remembering what one receives.
quotes.name: Alexander Dumas

quotes.message: I don't need a friend who changes when I change and who nods when I nod; my shadow does that much better.
quotes.name: Plutarch

quotes.message: The truth is, everyone is going to hurt you. You just got to find the ones worth suffering for.
quotes.name: Bob Marley

quotes.message: To find a friend one must close one eye. To keep him—close two.
quotes.name: Norman Douglas

quotes.message: [Friends are] God’s apology for relations.
quotes.name: Hugh Kingsmill

quotes.message: It may be more difficult to make new friends as you get older but it is some consolation to know how easy it is to lose them when you are young.
quotes.name: Jeffrey Bernard

quotes.message: Thank you for being a friend . Traveled down a road and back again . Your heart is true, you're a pal and a confidant.
quotes.name: Andrew Gold

quotes.message: What would you think if I sang out of tune? . Would you stand up and walk out on me? . Lend me your ears and I'll sing you a song . And I'll try not to sing out of key . Oh, I get by with a little help from my friends.
quotes.name: Paul McCartney and John Lennon

quotes.message: For good times and bad times . I'll be on your side forever more . That's what friends are for.
quotes.name: Burt Bacharach and Carole Bayer Sager

quotes.message: Two sturdy oaks I mean, which side by side, . Withstand the winter's storm, . And spite of wind and tide, . Grow up the meadow's pride, . For both are strong . Above they barely touch, but undermined . Down to their deepest source, . Admiring you shall find . Their roots are intertwined . Insep'rably.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: I was angry with my friend: . I told my wrath, my wrath did end. . I was angry with my foe: . I told it not, my wrath did grow.
quotes.name: William Blake

quotes.message: It’s not that diamonds are a girl’s best friend, but it’s your best friends who are your diamonds.
quotes.name: Gina Barreca

quotes.message: There is nothing I would not do for those who are really my friends. I have no notion of loving people by halves, it is not my nature.
quotes.name: Jane Austen

quotes.message: What is a friend? A single soul dwelling in two bodies.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: A friend is one who overlooks your broken fence and admires the flowers in the garden.
quotes.name: Unknown

quotes.message: No person is your friend who demands your silence, or denies your right to grow.
quotes.name: Alice Walker

quotes.message: Growing apart doesn’t change the fact that for a long time we grew side by side; our roots will always be tangled. I’m glad for that.
quotes.name: Ally Condie

quotes.message: Find a group of people who challenge and inspire you; spend a lot of time with them, and it will change your life.
quotes.name: Amy Poehler

quotes.message: Some people arrive and make such a beautiful impact on your life, you can barely remember what life was like without them.
quotes.name: Anna Taylor

quotes.message: A true friend never gets in your way unless you happen to be going down.
quotes.name: Arnold H. Glasgow

quotes.message: A good friend can tell you what is the matter with you in a minute. He may not seem such a good friend after telling.
quotes.name: Arthur Brisbane

quotes.message: For beautiful eyes, look for the good in others; for beautiful lips, speak only words of kindness; and for poise, walk with the knowledge that you are never alone.
quotes.name: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.message: A true friend is someone who thinks that you are a good egg even though he knows that you are slightly cracked.
quotes.name: Bernard Meltzer

quotes.message: An insincere and evil friend is more to be feared than a wild beast; a wild beast may wound your body, but an evil friend will wound your mind.
quotes.name: Buddha

quotes.message: Friends should be like books, few, but hand-selected.
quotes.name: C.J. Langenhoven

quotes.message: Friendship is like a glass ornament, once it is broken it can rarely be put back together exactly the same way.
quotes.name: Charles Kingsley

quotes.message: Tis the privilege of friendship to talk nonsense, and to have her nonsense respected.
quotes.name: Charles Lamb

quotes.message: One measure of friendship consists not in the number of things friends can discuss, but in the number of things they need no longer mention.
quotes.name: Clifton Fadiman

quotes.message: What you do not want done to yourself, do not do to others.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: A friend knows the song in my heart and sings it to me when my memory fails.
quotes.name: Donna Roberts

quotes.message: Friends are those rare people who ask how we are and then wait to hear the answer.
quotes.name: Ed Cunningham

quotes.message: There is one friend in the life of each of us who seems not a separate person, however dear and beloved, but an expansion, an interpretation, of one’s self, the very meaning of one’s soul.
quotes.name: Edith Wharton

quotes.message: Many people will walk in and out of your life, but only true friends will leave footprints in your heart.
quotes.name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.message: True friends don’t judge each other, they judge other people together.
quotes.name: Emilie Saint-Genis

quotes.message: I like to listen. I have learned a great deal from listening carefully. Most people never listen.
quotes.name: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.message: The best time to make friends is before you need them.
quotes.name: Ethel Barrymore

quotes.message: The real test of friendship is can you literally do nothing with the other person? Can you enjoy those moments of life that are utterly simple?
quotes.name: Eugene Kennedy

quotes.message: A friend can tell you things you don’t want to tell yourself.
quotes.name: Frances Ward Weller

quotes.message: It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages.
quotes.name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.message: Love is blind; friendship closes its eyes.
quotes.name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.message: Nothing makes the earth seem so spacious as to have friends at a distance; they make the latitudes and longitudes.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: True friendship can afford true knowledge. It does not depend on darkness and ignorance.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: There’s not a word yet for old friends who’ve just met.
quotes.name: Jim Henson

quotes.message: In prosperity our friends know us; in adversity we know our friends.
quotes.name: John Churton Collins

quotes.message: In the sweetness of friendship let there be laughter and sharing of pleasure. For in the dew of little things the heart finds its morning and is refreshed.
quotes.name: Khalil Gibran

quotes.message: A single rose can be my garden… a single friend, my world.
quotes.name: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.message: A good friend is a connection to life a tie to the past, a road to the future, the key to sanity in a totally insane world.
quotes.name: Lois Wyse

quotes.message: Let us be grateful to the people who make us happy; they are the charming gardeners who make our souls blossom.
quotes.name: Marcel Proust

quotes.message: Friendship improves happiness, and abates misery, by doubling our joys, and dividing our grief.
quotes.name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.message: In the End, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends.
quotes.name: Martin Luther King

quotes.message: Friends are the siblings God never gave us.
quotes.name: Mencius

quotes.message: Never forget that a true friend is someone who understands your past, believes in your future, and accepts you just the way you are.
quotes.name: Noel Jones

quotes.message: Ultimately the bond of all companionship, whether in marriage or in friendship, is conversation.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: Anybody can sympathise with the sufferings of a friend, but it requires a very fine nature to sympathise with a friend’s success.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: There is a magnet in your heart that will attract true friends. That magnet is unselfishness, thinking of others first; when you learn to live for others, they will live for you.
quotes.name: Paramahansa Yogananda

quotes.message: A friendship that can end never really began.
quotes.name: Publilius Syrus

quotes.message: I value the friend who for me finds time on his calendar, but I cherish the friend who for me does not consult his calendar.
quotes.name: Robert Brault

quotes.message: A friend is a gift you give yourself.
quotes.name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.message: If you have two friends in your lifetime, you’re lucky. If you have one good friend, you’re more than lucky.
quotes.name: S.E. Hinton

quotes.message: The great thing about new friends is that they bring new energy to your soul.
quotes.name: Shanna Rodriguez

quotes.message: Life is partly what we make it, and partly what it is made by the friends we choose.
quotes.name: Tennessee Williams

quotes.message: Don’t make friends who are comfortable to be with. Make friends who will force you to lever yourself up.
quotes.name: Thomas J. Watson

quotes.message: Sweet is the memory of distant friends! Like the mellow rays of the departing sun, it falls tenderly, yet sadly, on the heart.
quotes.name: Washington Irving

quotes.message: A friend is one that knows you as you are, understands where you have been, accepts what you have become, and still, gently allows you to grow.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: If you live to be 100, I hope I live to be 100 minus 1 day, so I never have to live without you.
quotes.name: Winnie the Pooh
